exclusion:
1. Put network controller in Inclusion / Exclusion mode.
  2. Hold a small magnet near to reed switch until the LED is turned on. Remove magnet right away when LED turned on. LED will remain on for next 4 seconds and then it will flash once to indicate NIF is sent.
  3. Repeat the step 2 if LED is not flashed once.
  4. The controller will indicate the successful inclusion/ exclusion operation.
inclusion:
1. Put network controller in Inclusion / Exclusion mode.
  2. Hold a small magnet near to reed switch until the LED is turned on. Remove magnet right away when LED turned on. LED will remain on for next 4 seconds and then it will flash once to indicate NIF is sent.
  3. Repeat the step 2 if LED is not flashed once.
  4. The controller will indicate the successful inclusion/ exclusion operation.
label: SWM301
overview:
SWM 301 is a battery-powered RF module using Z-Wave® technology for reporting secondary water metering readings in domestic dwellings.

The RF module records the meter reading by backlash-free pick-up on the litre wheel of the meter register and transmits the data over the Zwave network either on a time or delta change.
wakeup:
Hold a small magnet near to reed switch until the LED is turned on. Remove magnet right away when LED turned on. LED will remain on for next 4 seconds and then it will flash once to indicate NIF is sent.

SWM301 will wake up for 10 seconds after sending NIF

parameters.label: Meter register offset
parameters.overview: Offset to adjust the reported to the actual meter reading.

parameters.label: Meter reading reporting intervals
parameters.description: how often meter reading is sent
parameters.overview: Defines how often the meter reading is sent.

parameters.label: Delta config for meter reading
parameters.overview: Defines the minimum change of the meter reading that results in an unsolicited meter report.

parameters.label: Temperature delta
parameters.overview: Defines how much the temperature has to change for an unsolicited temperature report.

parameters.label: Temperature Alarm Threshold
parameters.overview: Defines below what temperature a low temperature alarm is reported.

associations.label: Meter reading
associations.overview: Group 1 - Nodes to receive unsolicited water meter reading.

associations.label: low battery
associations.overview: Group 2 - Nodes to receive unsolicited low battery warnings report.

associations.label: Temperature and low temp alarm
associations.overview: Group 3 - Nodes to receive unsolicited temperature report and low temperature alarm.
